item.title: Et Tu, Magic Johnson? The Late Night Shows That Failed to Launch
item.description: From Alan Thicke to Chevy Chase to Pat Sajak, the history of late night TV is littered with short-lived disasters and low-rated also-rans.

item.title: Malcolm-Jamal Warner Remembered by Tracee Ellis Ross, Magic Johnson, More: “You Made the World a Brighter Place”
item.description: The ‘Cosby Show’ actor died from an accidental drowning off the coast of Costa Rica on Sunday.
